casebody.data:
Hayes VAN GORDER, Appellant, v. A. C. ADERHOLD, Warden, United States Penitentiary, at Atlanta, Georgia, Appellee. No. 6547. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Oct. 15, 1932. Hayes Van Gorder, in pro. per. Clint W. Hager, U. S. Atty., and Hal Lindsay, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before BRYAN, SIBLEY, and WALKER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

On the authority of Austin v. United States (C. C. A.) 19 F.(2d) 127, and Boyd v. Archer (C. C. A.) 42 F.(2d) 43, 70 A. L. R. 1507, the judgment is affirmed.
